post.body: watching TV and I see a promo, "Flirting with Forty" an original lifetime movie. Care to comment?
Gave up after adding powdered sugar & some corn starch it didn't firm up. Thought about drinking it then @acmewife lol'd @ me.
I talked to an ex-Cop buddy. Issues is not alley but Can ask for your name "Terry Stop" http://is.gd/9DZY @chadarizona @tdhurst
Guy wlking around w/ a nice camera in a possibly ghetto part of town = lil out of place. If harassed after name = then a prob
Talked to buddy who has PD exp. The alley alley thing was prob BS, but PD does have a right to ask your name. (Cont)
You are breaking NO LAW by posting photos of any officer who is in a public place. @brullig is correct. Do share more deets.
Also Ipod covers sleeves and point and shoot camera bags. Check out Acme Made http://acmemade.com Great quality.
I didn't know that. Never seen that font. Also @luzbonita had a good list of font names as well.
I'd rather stick forks in my eye balls!
it never hurts to throw some names in the suggestion box either! :-)
Yes she has, but we don't always think of it as win vs. loose. Son #1's name was her idea and #2 was my idea, (so she says)
No it's not a bad thing yet over a certain number & some may feel like the person can't connect as well with the community.
Yes I did know. Also cool they call you "agent". When you say you know the "players"..you talking about the realtor rappers?
That is correct, Maybe I'll have them invoice 'em first or partner w/ a collections agency. @luzbonita should apply? :-)
and @strebel Hey guys maybe you should be "friends" on this website. http://www.hatebook.org
Most of my domains are w/ you & it's nice your local yet every hr @namecheap looks more appealing for renewals. Just sayin' :-)
Clement Clarke Moore
Could say I have a "partnership" with google, like seo scams. Fyi there is a human based search enginge you can call or txt.
last week I had to tell her the fcc was not shutting down christan radio, however this weeks IS true. Warning Obama is a virus!
FYI, I can tell your last DM was an auto reply. Yes I wanted to navigate away from your ebook looking site (RE: nag popup)
Got a phone call from "Kurt Warner" promoting socialx.com IMO If he wanted to connect he'd just twitter like @THE_REAL_SHAQ
You might want to pick up some 5 hr energy so you can keep up w/ the kids or maybe 5hr UN-Energy to FEED our kids!
the kids have been no better than earlier. Broken snow globe now, pick up some reinforcements, asprin, or Mary Poppins if you can
We normally mail UPS a check, but that's lame. I'm looking to pay with CC or bank routing. You're right no past invoices. Grr.
http://is.gd/aM8m is good, but I'd like the rail road track photos in their own gallery...they are getting lost in brick walls.
You mean clicksmart they didn't promise you 500 hits per month, with reporting, stats etc? That's what they promised me!
I saw your name over the weekend when I was on clicksmart.com. You advertise with them, or did they just scrape your name?
Has a good question about using Flickr professionally http://is.gd/aHmv I think much has to do with participation & Intent.
asked if we could spread the word in #phx about this class/ event http://areyousociallyacceptable.com but I was afraid of rejection!
not that ad, I thought that one was for vzn and yes that one is (stupid) weird. This ad is for the iphone, by at&t.
Isn't the time requred for instant coffee = zero? Maybe use regular coffee and you won't need such short times? :-)
Thanks for the warning, however I was about to duck out the door to go to downtownish Phx / west tempe, so you'll miss me. :-)
which photos? These are the stolen photos. Not the NYC guy's work. http://www.nyfoodphotography.com/samples.html
= example of how to NOT use twitter. 1) Signup, 2)tweet URL 3)add 2k friends. Why so many warm welcomes? http://is.gd/beJl
Ya I know....I have some at @namecheap, but I don't think I can jerk these (now) b/c it's too close to renewal time, :-(
No client list is not gone, he simply has none, that's what I wanted you to see. You read the article right? http://is.gd/b3F6
Do you grow the chocolate in your back yard, or just the mint? ;-) @ECNewlin It was a disaster..choc clogged up the brewing!
Welcome to twitter. I thought of you last month when LA auto show emailed & asked if I was going to press days this year.
I wasn't sure if the driver was quite legal either, but who am I to profile drivers.
not GoDaddy... they didn't invite me, but I guess its not crashing then. @kadedworkin thanks for the location. You going?
Yo mamma!? I caused this once. Gave a talk to photographers about social media, mom then jumps on FB because of me. Poor kids.
Your website said I was not qualified, is it because I'm white/male, or that I didn't pay 2 upgrade to "pick my seat"?
When you followed me I thought you were http://lenmar.com I use their niMh AA batteries. Then I saw 2 N's in @Lennar
It is a long drive. As a child we went from SVG to Missoula in one day w/ 3 kids in back seat. How long are you in sindey?
Possibly if calling ups general # but calling billing department . Dear United Parcel Service, if you want paid please call me.
TSA: they don't Xray pets, so so that's not the problem, however the only 3oz of liquid is a problem for fish! http://is.gd/d9hr
http://twitpic.com/vfhc - Didn't know your grandmother was a fan of AcmePhoto. It does look like my logo
Also I saw Qwerty the other day and he said howdy. I contract out to break the al qaeda code. ;-)
asdf Lmnop, EIEIOh? Was I part of a cryptic message, and how must I now respond? :-)
I just mostly want to video taking a fish thru TSA airport security w/ only 3oz of water. ;-) Maybe PETA will lobby TSA then
I'm thinking about taking a fish on an airplane and they only let you take 3oz of liquid x3 bottles. :-( @SteveBelt @treo700
Some water would be good for a fish. @treo700 says a gallon, (not when you buy 'em in stores tho) @epicthings = @ least 1cup
I tweet on most all of my photoshoots. I did twitter on the way to the ER once.
Appreciation of the @wayne_gretzky account direcly linked to @notshaqoneal @THE_REAL_SHAQ & @wardandrews http://is.gd/8myT
I said, "My trick for GoDaddy dosen't work"
Overheard: from sales guy @ camera store in Tempe "knowing how to use a tripod is what separates the pros from the amateurs" (I chuckled.)
Mostly done with photos for Kappa Kappa Gamma, next to gammage @ Arizona state. I'm hungary, would pizza deliver to a park?
overheard: from my 6 year old "Cranberry sauce is For the Win"
I failed to listen to @Acmewife and I ate the leftover potatoes we're supposed to eat for dinner tonight. Oops, she just found out.
In prepping for my sorority photo shoot tomorrow I watched a video comparing sorority girl w/ non sorority girl. http://vimeo.com/1524678
OH: via @ryanatmghwom > Funniest Digg comment ever: "I joined Pownce because I think Leah is cute, not because it has any practical use."
Maybe I could loose some weight w/ group help via http://fitphotographers.com. I see @benjphoto is on board. http://is.gd/9MvM R others in?
Scouting a new location at ASU from my office using Google maps street view and a sorority girl on location w/ a cell phone camera.
Trying to whip some half and half for some leftover pumkin pie. Not sure if 1/2 and 1/2 will whip, but I can sure try!
Renewed http://tweetupAZ.com for an additional year, while buying 1 extra month on my hosting plan to get $1.99 Gd renewal. Tricky :-)
Picking up a 1/2 sheet birthday cake at costco, because it's cheaper than a 1/4 sheet @ Frys marketplace.
Overheard: "When we want our house to smell good, we'll run the microwave" - after I suggested using some bleach & Pinesol to clean it.
Are there any cool fonts that start with a C or an M and could also double as a Girl's name?
The wife is asking if it's ok to think of baby names that dont't start with M or C. Kinda one of my guidelines. What to you think?
I just read all the Christmas letters & cards..(from LAST YEAR) They were in a box with the decorations. We're trimming the tree now.
I have mixed feelings about almost having 1000 facebook "friends".. didn't realize until someone mentioned it this week.
Accepting applications for a "copyright intern" 4 DMCA notices. Bonus if you hate rap music http://is.gd/agIG or Realtors http://is.gd/agJr
Did QuikTrip Jump the Shark? RT @AcmeWife: Helping the lady at QT make change . . . Total = 2.54 Given = 3.04 Change = ??? Hint: Not 2.36
Last week, I "replied all" to Gramma to inform her to use the google before fwd'ing urban legends. Now she emails me, "how about this one"
Overheard: "nice camera" me, thanks.
Overheard: on photoshoot "Can you do a full length shot so I don't look like a huge cow?"
Out the door to photograph corporate holiday party. 2 photos from last yr Ladies http://is.gd/awEX and Corporate jumping http://is.gd/awFi
unfollow @Stayinhome (for sending snail mail correspondence in a God forsaken evil font!)
woot, guess who's on the phone http://clicksmart.com Wonder how much $$ they're not going to get from me? http://is.gd/avi7http://is.gd/avij
Dear UPS, your online payment system is lame. Have to create new account for billing profile, now it sees no invoices? Do You want paid?
Left Safeway. I manually enter phone # to get club savings. They see wife's name & aren't sure if I'm Mr Nollmeyer as they wish me farewell.
The real "winner" photo from my outing yesterday = these 3 bums by the railroad tracks. Don't they clean up well? http://is.gd/aMVN
Overheard: "They wanted to be shot (photographed) on the tracks?" Reply, "Ya, they pretty much all do, I could do an entire satire on this"
Overheard: "I think that's how people should loose weight. (In a drug induced comma) Forget stomach stapling"
Inspired by a fellow artist, I did some photography downtown.. I bring to you Phx1 http://twitpic.com/r95k (sorry guy got in the shot ;-)
Glad to see that Hillary Clinton is popular with the Y gen and the obama camp. Stupid that some blogs blamed facebook.http://is.gd/ayyM
Did I just see a Twitter app on the iphone ad for at&t just now on TV? I think so, but I didn't catch any usernames.
http://twitpic.com/r1k2 - Photographing some random dudes in suits downtown. Yes we have a photo permit. Woot.
Sign: @ buffet "Help us maintain our reasonable prices by not taking food & beverage from the restaurant" my advice, take less each time.
Hey Canon and Nikon Dslr fans. Great video. Hitler Rants about the D3x http://tinyurl.com/58tjsu
I don't hate gays, in fact I'd love to let those skipping work for http://daywithoutagay.org clean my yard. Must I be a 501(c)?? :-)
Leaving the Phx zoo after picking up some zoolights tickets. Comparing notes with their photo greeter people. Telling them to chimp more.
http://twitpic.com/rgn6 - Marcus have me some extra gaffers tape, this stuff is like gold for photographers.
Out the door to help marcus with one of his photoshoots. (so he'll owe me) Why isn't http://marcushoffmanphotography.com/ on twitter?!?!
http://twitpic.com/s27k - Like when corporate events have a production company. Looks classy + having catering backstage.
Overheard: from wife, "Are you going to put your pants or just your jacket"? my reply, "That's why they pay me the big bucks."
It was easy to overlook small burn by BBQ grill after eating such a fabulous T-bone steak. How did @clintus not eat meat for several weeks?
Quick lunch anyone? Now, central phoenix around cambelback, Indian school, etc. @ dm, call, text, etc.
Update#1 Food photographer in last tweet who uses stock images as his own work has a funny "client list" on his website. http://is.gd/b4mm
Photo community outs food photographer using stock images as his own. Please digg this. http://is.gd/b3F6
How many of you have gotten friend request from ppl on facebook who incorrectly set up an account with "business name" vs real name?
Watching a live Christmas Party with Geoff Smith @ The Big Bang Bar in Nashville via http://www.ustream.tv/channel/cali-live Pretty good.
The THOUGHT of making mint mocha by throwing mint tea, hot chocolate mix and coffee in the coffee maker was much better than reality. :-O
Photographers, Get a PocketWizard for $150 with Amazon Goldbox for 1hr 20 min http://amazon.com/gp/goldbox. Also $25 mfgr rebate available
http://twitpic.com/svo8 - Got rope? Be careful following this pickup truck.
Oh: This baby craves slurpies... And tatter-tots". ( @acmewife talking about the unborn @acmebaby )
http://twitpic.com/sow4 - I saw this sign today.
Overheard: St a corporate party. "acmeDiffuser, so that's your secret."
Good lunch with a North Phoenix designer @bleivian He knows his print and web stuff. Now off to crash a corporate holiday party.
Need more hard drive space? Costoc has a Western Digital 1TB external w/ Firewire 400, USB, and eSata for $140! http://is.gd/bnAN
Santa Clause is streaming on ustream. http://tinyurl.com/yryjx5 sponsored by @DataBrokers
oh my! Great youtube ad, The "drunk special" down at "Jones' Big Ass Truck Rental & Storage" http://is.gd/alzA
Why is http://www.clicksmart.com/ talking to me on the phone right now? We already went over this when they called 2 wks ago! *augh*
FAIL #2 for UPS.com other wk created online profile, which dosen't do back invoices. Call billing today to discuss. Msg says are "too busy"
Is email no longer the best way to "spam" ppl? Phone call on behalf of Pitney Bowes, person asked me to go to http://pbcallcenter1.com
Does anyone know what the minimum amount of water a fish needs to survive for a few hrs? This would be a beta sized fish.
These are the Kids w/ Santa photos I want to see more of. http://is.gd/cYsJ
